channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: December 23, 2025 Today's Verse 1 Corinthians 3:19–20 [19] For the wisdom of this world is folly with God. For it is written, “He catches the wise in their craftiness,” [20] and again, “The Lord knows the thoughts of the wise, that they are futile.” Today's Memory Verse Romans 12: 1-2 - I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.
